website_summaries.verdict: This buffalo leather sheath accommodates tracker blades of five inches in length.
pros: Quality aesthetic and fair to good craftsmanship
cons: Knives with thicker handles are not likely to fit
Dimensions should always be considered before purchase

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but poor quality snaps.
customer_reviews.text: The leather is nice and my knife fit well. However, two of the snaps broke first time out and I almost lost my knife on a trail. I had to take it off and put my old sheath on to finish the hunt. Snaps seem to be made of a soft cheap material. I hope to replace all the snaps and actually use this item for something other than looks.
customer_reviews.author: cljordan

customer_reviews.title: HATE IT... MISLEAD!!!
customer_reviews.text: DISLIKE!!!? MISLEAD!!! I'LL NEVER ORDER ANOTHER ITEM FROM THEM.....The dimensions were correct for ordering...A KNIFE...the sheath is a 1/4 inch too tight.. However your blade is the exact dimensions they give so when you slide your blade in the first time you cut the sewing on it and it's ruined and the first three in that you put it in.,... I will never order anything from them again and I can't return it because of their ineptitude and providing the correct information based on the exact size of the blade not what was made.... Totally pissed!
customer_reviews.author: William Scott Titus

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheath.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a very nice fixed blade knife...but hated the sheath that came with it! I searched until I found this one. After checking all the dimensions I took a chance and bought it. The fit was just a tad large, but no where near as huge as the sheath I was replacing. My only small suggestion would be to include some sort of belt loop.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Rann

customer_reviews.title: Not good wuality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design and style. Worked ok for the first couple of months... it saw only a few days of hunting use, and is already starting to fall apart and the buttons don’t latch well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Design not great
customer_reviews.text: Snap not very strong. I felt like I may loose my knife.
customer_reviews.author: Schrek6

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing for the price but no left vs right hand option.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff_H

customer_reviews.title: 5 inch Bowie perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very well made , fits my 4.5 inch Bowie perfect
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Cool sheath
customer_reviews.text: Great sheath fits the tracker knife very well. Would like a vertical belt loop also. The sheath is still well built and designed
customer_reviews.author: Charles B Kilgore III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice and well built sheath , I had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent workmanship perfect fit, makes a great addition to my outdoor gear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Santucci

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality . . . not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. The knife was loose in the sheath, and would slip out . . . and the first time I wore it, one of the straps broke, because it's made from poor material.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Spears

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it for my tracker knife
customer_reviews.text: A very well made and handsome sheath.Glad I bought it for my tracker knife.
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: Been lookin all over for a sheath like this one
customer_reviews.text: Been lookin all over for a sheath like this one. Simple leather sheath without all the add ons. Awesome and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jared Tuel

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. it didn't fit the knife I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it.it didn't fit the knife I bought it for but it fit my busse badger attack ergo
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: looks like it will last 1 week if that
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made....cheap attachment points...... looks like it will last 1 week if that....Doesn't fit my tom brown tracker like advertised...don't waste your time...
customer_reviews.author: Brett W.

product_meta.title: Whole Earth Supply Brown Leather Tracker Sheath Fixed Blade Knife Hunting Skinning Blanks Knives
product_meta.description: High quality Tracker style knife sheath. This is a right-handed draw sheath when worn on the left hip, or a left-handed draw sheath when worn on the back. 8.25" total length. 2" wide at sheath opening. Fits up to 5" long Tracker blade. Fits up to 2.1" wide Tracker blade (2.125" wide blades are a tight fit). Fits up to 0.75" thick knife handle (Thicker handles are not supported. The button will not snap on handles which are too thick). 1/8" Thick Genuine Buffalo Leather. White stitching. High quality. Belt loop on back fits up to 1 1/2" width belt. These sheaths are custom made for us. Last photo shows how the sheath will look with a Tracker knife fit inside it. Knife not included. This sheath fits all the tracker blanks and knives we sell. Tracker knives come in many shapes and sizes. Please ensure the dimensions stated above fit your blade before purchasing.
feature_bullets: Important: Please ensure this sheath will fit ALL dimensions of your knife before purchasing:

Fits a tracker style blade up to 5 inches long, up to 2.1" wide (2.125" wide blades are a tight fit). Fits up to 0.75" thick handle maximum (Thicker handles are not supported. The button will not snap on handles which are too thick).
Sheath is 8.25 inches in total outside length, 2" wide at opening.
1/8" thick genuine buffalo leather. Belt loop on back fits up to 1 1/2" width belt. This is a right-handed draw sheath when worn on the left hip, or a left-handed draw sheath when worn on the back.
This sheath fits all the tracker blanks and knives we sell. Tracker knives come in many shapes and sizes. Please ensure the dimensions stated above fit your blade before purchasing.
